rsb.wrappers

Class RSItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • rsb.methods.MethodProvider
      • rsb.wrappers.RSItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Clickable07

    public class RSItem
extends MethodProvider
implements Clickable07
    Represents an item (with an id and stack size). May or may not wrap a component.
